arts.ttl: Germany set NL record with 7-0 rout of Bosnia
arts.sum: Germany dismantled visitors Bosnia and Herzegovina 7-0 on Saturday with a statement win and two goals apiece from Florian Wirtz and Tim Kleindienst to secure top spot in their Nations League group A3 with a game to spare.

arts.ttl: Kimmich injury fears allayed after substitution against Bosnia-Herzegovina
arts.sum: Joshua Kimmich didn't suffer a serious injury in Germany's 7-0 win over Bosnia-Herzegovina.

arts.ttl: Nagelsmann and Kleindienst delighted after Bosnia-Herzegovina win
arts.sum: Julian Nagelsmann gave massive praise towards his team after the 7-0 win over Bosnia and Herzegovina and man-of-the-match Tim Kleindienst also spoke on his dream first set of goals for Germany.

arts.ttl: Musiala reacts to Germany's thumping of Bosnia-Herzegovina: "That was fun!"
arts.sum: Being on the pitch for Germany in their 7-0 thrashing of Bosnia-Herzegovina was "fun", says Jamal Musiala.

arts.ttl: Germany 7-0 Bosnia and Herzegovina: Player Ratings and Match Highlights
arts.sum: Julian Nagelsmann's side enjoyed a fruitful night in front of goal in Freiburg with Florian Wirtz putting in an all-dominant performance on the wing.

arts.ttl: Unstoppable Germany roll over Bosnia-Herzegovina to seal top spot
arts.sum: An emphatic 7-0 victory over Bosnia-Herzegovina sealed Germany's place at the top of UEFA Nations League Group A3.

arts.ttl: Can Stefan Ortega become a mainstay in the Germany squad?
arts.sum: Manchester City’s Stefan Ortega is getting his first taste of international football. Receiving his maiden call-up to the German national team, the 32-year-old has been training alongside Oliver Baumann and…

arts.ttl: “The relationship is simply too close” – Toni Kroos hints at possible return to Real Madrid
arts.sum: Toni Kroos’ absence in the Real Madrid first team squad has been massively felt during the first three months of the 2024-25 season, and Carlo Ancelotti is still trying to fill the void that the German midfield maestro vacated during the summer. arts.ttl: Robert Andrich comments on whether Xabi Alonso and Florian Wirtz will leave Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: During the summer, there were a number of reports linking Xabi Alonso with a move away from Bayer Leverkusen. While a possible departure to Bayern Munich was heavily documented, Liverpool…

arts.ttl: ‘Very important’: Kai Havertz says Arsenal have a player he thinks is ‘just unreal’
